import React, { useState } from 'react' const WorkPiece = ({id,header,context,date,handleDeleteWorkingPiece}) => { const[isVisible,setIsVisible] = useState(false); return (
{header}
handleDeleteWorkingPiece(id)} className="far fa-trash-alt" style = {{cursor:"pointer"}}>

{date}

{ this.isVisible ?

{}

{context}

: null }
) } export default WorkPiece;
